Part 1: Creating the pollutantmean function
```{r}
library(readr, plyr)
pollutantmean <- function(directory, pollutant, id = 1:332) {
  mydata <- data.frame()
  for (i in id) {
  xid <- sprintf("%03d.csv", i)
  xpath <- paste0(directory,"/",xid)
  x001 <- read.csv(xpath, header = TRUE)
  mydata <- rbind(mydata, x001)
  }
  ans <- mean(mydata[[pollutant]], na.rm = TRUE)
  ans
}
```
